section.name: Screenshots
section.span: How to view screenshots in the userguide.

div.p: You see here an example screenshot with a very small relevant part. You can enlarge it by double clicking and reduce it again by single clicking.

section.p: The screenshots in this userguide normally only show a small part of the screen, the part that is relevant for the text.

Sometimes, you may want to see the rest of the screenshot, if you do not recognize where that part is in the total screen. You can see the complete screenshot: double click with your mouse pointer on the screenshot. The image will then become as large as possibly fits on your page and if not all fits, you can use the scrollbars with your mouse pointer to scroll over the screenshot. If you single click on the screenshot, it becomes small again, showing the relevant part. In the small and relevant state, you also can use the scrollbar.

ul.li: If you are doing one of the tours, use the back button of your browser to continue. (There is no hyperlink here, because you can get here from many different pages.)
